start.text: {{w|*Luminary-at-Dawn is gloriously silent.*}}~ {{w|*The fungus-chrome union waves =pronouns.possessive= manipulator at you. Or does =pronouns.subjective=?*}}~ {{w|*You feel the cold touch of the union's telepathic connection.*}}~ {{w|*You feel Luminary-at-Dawn focusing on your mind.*}}

choice.text: *Tell =pronouns.objective= you want to go over your belongings.*
